forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 24. West wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 38. West wind 5 to 8 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, Boston awakens under a blanket of clarity, the stars fading gently as the hours creep toward dawn. With the temperature hovering at a crisp 24 degrees, a delicate west wind whispers through the streets, bringing a chill that invites warmth and layers. As the sun rises, it will grace the city with a promise of a sunny day, lifting spirits and illuminating the stark beauty of winter’s embrace. 

As you move through your day, dressing in insulated layers will not only provide comfort but also allow you to enjoy the invigorating air. A wool scarf and a well-fitted coat will serve as your companions against the brisk atmosphere. The sunshine promises to lend a cheerful disposition to the afternoon, where the high reaches toward 38. It’s a perfect day for a quiet stroll through the parks or along the waterfront. Perhaps stop in at a local café for a warm drink, letting the gentle bustle of the city envelop you. Today unfolds unhurriedly, adorned with the simple pleasures that winter offers—the sparkle of frost, the muted whispers of the wind, and the vibrant life of a city nestled in its seasonal rhythms.
